back-workouts.name: Deadlifts
back-workouts.description: Stand with feet hip-width apart, grip bar with hands shoulder-width apart, keep back straight, and lift the bar by extending hips and knees.

back-workouts.name: Bent-over rows
back-workouts.description: Bend forward at the waist with knees slightly bent, grasp barbell with hands shoulder-width apart, and pull the bar towards your chest.

back-workouts.name: Pull-ups
back-workouts.description: Grab a pull-up bar with a wide grip, pull yourself up until your chin is above the bar, and lower yourself back down.

back-workouts.name: Lat pulldowns
back-workouts.description: Sit at a lat pulldown machine, grasp the bar with hands wider than shoulder-width apart, and pull the bar down to your chest.

back-workouts.name: Seated cable rows
back-workouts.description: Sit at a cable row machine, grasp the handles with hands shoulder-width apart, and pull the handles towards your chest while keeping your back straight.

back-workouts.name: Back extensions
back-workouts.description: Lie face down on a back extension machine, hook your feet under the padded bar, and lift your upper body until your back is straight.

back-workouts.name: Bent Over Rows
back-workouts.description: Hold a barbell with your palms facing down, bend over at the waist, and keep your back straight. Pull the barbell up to your chest, then lower it back down.

back-workouts.name: Seated Cable Rows
back-workouts.description: Sit at a cable row machine and grab the handles with your palms facing each other. Pull the handles back towards your torso, then slowly release them forward.

back-workouts.name: Dumbbell Rows
back-workouts.description: Hold a dumbbell in one hand and place the opposite knee and hand on a bench. Keep your back straight and pull the dumbbell up to your chest, then lower it back down.

back-workouts.name: Hyperextensions
back-workouts.description: Lie face down on a hyperextension machine and hook your feet under the pads. Cross your arms over your chest and lift your torso up as high as you can.

back-workouts.name: Good Mornings
back-workouts.description: Stand with your feet shoulder-width apart and a barbell across your shoulders. Bend forward at the waist, keeping your back straight, then lift back up.

back-workouts.name: Deadlifts
back-workouts.description: Stand with your feet shoulder-width apart and a barbell in front of you. Bend your knees and hips to grab the bar with your hands, then lift it up to your hips.

back-workouts.name: Dumbbell pullovers
back-workouts.description: Lie with your upper back across a bench, hold a dumbbell with both hands and extend your arms behind your
